column4: I need help installing my WiFi card
| what tpye do you have?
Intel Pro 6945 AGN (I THINK thats the number... I only know how to check it in Windows)
is it PCI? USB? or onboard?
on board I guess. Its a laptop
I checked but I don't know which one is it. I tried lspci, and there's an "unknown device" by Intel Corporation, under Network controller
With my previous installation yesterday, I typed some command that I got from a forum, and it downloaded something from sourceforge, and my card was listed correctly after that...
| I'm gonna check it out first?
| without underscore
are you still here?
| yes ? I'm kind of busy, sorry
Yes but the WiFi light is off
| are you in hotspot?
No, I'm at home
| the parameter is the same way you configure like wired, but in hotspot, your card will searching automatically.
The card is not even configured
| is there a button in your laptop to turn your WiFi on?
| Or do you have wireless connection in your home?
Yeah obviously
| may I ask you again? Have you download Ubuntu 7.10 beta?
No, I'm using Fiesty Fawn 7.04
